metadata.job_to_be_done: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Print this file1. Select from the upper right. Print2. Choose an appropriate printer in the dialog box. Comments And Forms OK3. Select one of the following, and then select one of the following.
save As File Save To save the completed form, choose from the hamburger menu ( > • As in macOS) and rename the file. to remove extended Acrobat Reader features, choose one of the following.
Acrobat Classic does not support AI Assistant. you can manage the deployment of Acrobat AI Assistant through the Admin Console. the users must restart Acrobat to see AI Assistant.

forms are filledableinteractive forms. form creators intentionally design a form that you can fill in only by hand. form is filledableinteractive forms interactiveAn form contains fields that you can select or fill in.

the Fill & Sign tool automatically detects the form fields. you can manually add text and other symbols anywhere on the form. you can complete the forms by entering information and adding your signatures.
